Sounds like you could have polycystic ovarian sydrome (PCOS).  Especially as you are getting pimples and growing more hair (hyperandrogenism).  Have you also had an increase in weight?  Not ovulating and an absence of periods is also a sign of PCOS.This is something that needs to be treated.  You are at increased risk of insulin resistance and type II diabetes as well as other metabolic disorders.Your treatment will depend on what your symptoms are.  Whether it's just that you aren't ovulating or there are more.  It will probably be hormonal treatment, whether that be the pill or something else.It's something to discuss with your doctor and if your doctor doesn't want to talk to you about this, get a second opinion.
